entry.def: Stagecoaches were large carriages pulled by horses which carried passengers and mail.

means.word_mean: 1. a large coach-and-four formerly used to carry passengers and mail on regular routes between towns;

sentences.sentence: "we went out of town together by stage about ten or twelve miles"
